name: They Live
description:
YOU are a wealthy gem tycoon. The ENEMY is a group of bloodthirsty cacti that are hellbent on punching you, your army, and your miner employee's to the ozone layer. How many nights can you survive for?

Left/Right- Move

Down-Drop Coin/purchase wall upgrade

Z-Toggle Miners(produce coins)

X-Toggle Cowboys(shoot cacti)

Z+X-Speed Up time, if there are no enemies left

When you drop $$$ on the ground, any nearby hobos will pick it up, and will be hired whichever profession you have toggled (cowboy/miner). Miners will produce money over time, and cowboys will follow you around, protecting you from the enemy.
